Edit Jekyll Juice

July 30, 2013 ‚Ä¢ blog

This blog is now powered by Jekyll alone (was on Octopress). Brock Boland recently wrote about moving his blog to only Jekyll and I‚Äôd been wanting to do this for a while as well so I don‚Äôt need to worry about generators and such at all. Only took about an hour. Generate a jekyll site with jekyll new [site] and then just move your posts over, tweak your settings and theme and you‚Äôre done.

Theme is built with a little bit of zurb foundation. I typically use Bootstrap for small projects but thought I‚Äôd give this a try instead. So far so good.
